website_summaries.verdict: Almost identical to similar peelers but with a couple extras thrown in for added value.
pros: Durable stainless-steel construction is designed by a chef for optimal performance and quality
Sharp, dual blades quickly and easily peel or julienne
Includes a free cleaning brush and cook book
cons: Some feel the large construction is awkward to hold

customer_reviews.title: Durable and worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase. I am a chef and i go through tools like this constantly. I purchased a second time because my first one is several years old and showing some wear and tear. Literally it's used daily, from peeling to shaving hard cheeses. Great bang for your buck. It's withstood many trips through a commercial dishwasher, it's been thrown, dropped and abused by apprentices.
customer_reviews.author: geekygourmet

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT under any circumstances purchase this product.
customer_reviews.text: I had very, very high hopes for this peeler, but it could not have disappointed me more. It's simply impossible to use it without cutting yourself. It is clunky and very, very sharp. After cutting myself on a number of occasions and running through a lot of bandages, I've decided to simply stop using it in order to save my fingers from further injuries. It would seem that there are any number of better choices and I'm, sadly, committed to trying them now. Consider yourself warned.
customer_reviews.author: Reader

customer_reviews.title: Blade flipped and did a number on me
customer_reviews.text: Well I loved it until I learned the blades flip and I got julined (sp) It wouldn't stop bleeding throughout the day . I got like pin sized row of cuts to prove that is exactly what happened . The blade flipped and attacked me. But I do like the peeler takes off just the first layer of potatoes . I just wish I was able to keep my fingers flesh. Three days after photos you can see the actual pin sized dots and I was not julining (sp)
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Not Too Good Making Zoodles
customer_reviews.text: Zoodles...the lastest hip and trendy thing. I wanted to try making them but didn't want to spend a small fortune on a fancy machine if the zoodles didn't past the taste test at my house. This item had pretty good reviews and for the price I thought I would try it. Using zucchini to make the zoodles, they came out very thin. I would have liked them thicker but I also know that how I prepared them (for the first time) needs some work also. Will try this again.
customer_reviews.author: Savivi

customer_reviews.title: Intention was good but final product lacks safety features.
customer_reviews.text: Just bought this to make peeling at home more efficient . +++++Good points : ++ ++++ ++ - It's sharp and peels off quickly than my old peeler . -----Bad points ------- - It's sharp and is unsafe . Cut myself once and the cut was deep as it has very sharp blades . Recommendation : If you are fully focused while peeling then only buy this product . It's very sharp and can cause serious injury . Makers should put emphasis on safety .
customer_reviews.author: tvr

customer_reviews.title: Works great and is super sharp
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! This thing really works and did a great job with my Som Tum (Thai green papaya salad). It made it super easy to peel and slice the papaya because it's so sharp. This is now my go to peeler for everything! Apples, green papaya, cucumber, plums, carrots, it can peel anything. P.S. Be careful! I had a little mishap the first time I used this and accidentally peeled off my nail, but that's user error.
customer_reviews.author: Rina

customer_reviews.title: Worked Like a Charm
customer_reviews.text: Great item for making julienne vegetables. I bought this item to make pickled carrots and daikon radish for Banh Mi sandwiches. Worked great for peeling the carrots and radish and for making perfect sized strips. I also appreciate UberChef's customer service. They sent an email letting me know the item was on its way and then to let me know to contact them with any problems. Wow! You don't get customer service like this anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Zep_Fan

customer_reviews.title: Best peeler on the market
customer_reviews.text: Years ago, we bought a pair of Titan peelers (AS Seen On TV) and have used them for years until the last one finally broke. Apparently, they no longer make them, but this peeler is almost identical, and my wife loves it. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Bequette

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: This product is everything the vendor states and more! One tool performing many things is anyone's "must have." It is sharp so watch the fingernails! It juliennes perfectly with no waste! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: T. Davis

customer_reviews.title: all-around well designed
customer_reviews.text: I wish the handle was round or a bit bigger. I find it hard to grip sometimes and worry about nicking myself while. The peeler itself does a great job and I can julienne a carrot to about 1/8 inch left before it wont julienne any more. Peeler side works well, but same as the other reviews. I do worry that the grip is too small and it did slip in my hands a couple of times almost causing injury. Perhaps i can wrap something over the handle.
customer_reviews.author: Rob L

customer_reviews.title: Peeler falls apart while you use it & you have to keep putting it back together!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this peeler...how ever it doesn’t stay together while I’m using the peeler. I have to keep putting it back together. I have gone back to using my other ones I have. I just don’t have the patience to keep putting it together!!! If I had my receipt I would send them this back for a refund!!!! I was so happy when I found this peeler. I didn’t get the brush that it shows next to the peeler in the picture either!!! I didn’t get the free cookbook that was supposed to be a bonus!!! This is why I had to give few stars!! I’m very dissatisfied!!! Pamela
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: I am shocked at the lack of durability...
customer_reviews.text: I got this out today to peel some veggies for soup. It got halfway through the second carrot before the peeling blade snapped off. What a piece of junk. Expensive junk to boot.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Heidt

customer_reviews.title: Will not julienne except the hardest veggies, just a fancy peeler otherwise
customer_reviews.text: Got this to make zucchini and cucumber strips for sushi rolls. Veggies came out so thin - see-thru- with this tool, had to chop by hand instead. Cucumber just turned to watery shreds, not usable. Might work ok on harder veggies like carrots but hand-spiralizer works better, at least if you need for sushi-type size widths on your veggies. If you just want a peeler and not the julienne side, it's sharp and fine.
customer_reviews.author: Mornico71

customer_reviews.title: But the peeling side is great! Sharp blade
customer_reviews.text: 4 stars because I have only used the julienne side once, so feel I cannot properly comment on it. But the peeling side is great! Sharp blade. You have to change your way of peeling - this is a peel away from you, rather than peel towards you kind of peeler. But easy to use once you get the hang of it. Little brush for cleaning is very useful. The one time I used the julienne side was on carrots for soup. It worked well, once I realised I needed to rotate the carrot as I was peeling it. All in all a good peeler which is much better quality than your standard peeler you buy at the grocer store.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Surprised Myself
customer_reviews.text: I never thought I'd want this kind of peeler. I tried it for the other side, but it has become the only peeler I use in my kitchen. It is well-balanced and makes peeling a cucumber, winter squash and anything else I want to peel a breeze. I never use my other style peeler anymore. I even had to buy one for a sister whose hands didn't work with the usual style peeler, and she loves it, too!
customer_reviews.author: Mama Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Didn't know the blades were serrated
customer_reviews.text: Pay attention to the pictures. The blades are serrated. That's not the look I want in my foods when I peel them. I want a smooth texture. The serrated blade also makes it much harder to peel. Otherwise, this is well built and sturdy, but I'd rather opt for the one with a smooth blade.
customer_reviews.author: David Mei

customer_reviews.title: Built Too Tight
customer_reviews.text: Great concept, but the blades as so close to the body that I had to pick out pieces of food after almost every pass, which is not what I wanted to be doing. I should have listened to others who warned about this issue. Sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger

customer_reviews.title: A must have for healthy cooking!  Great quality and simple to use.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one of these and found that I use it more often than I expected. It is so simple to make julienne out of just about anything, and the uniformity of the cuts makes cooking so simple. I brought it with me over the holidays and used it for family dinners. My grown kids liked it so much that I shipped one to each of them. Great quality, VERY sharp, simple to use.
customer_reviews.author: Kayakin Dan

customer_reviews.title: A kitchen must have
customer_reviews.text: I originally had the plastic junk colored set which I threw out. Saw these were rated well. These are commercial quality in my opinion. Very sturdy and well made. The most important factor they don't clog up at the jullian blade side. This also comes with a handy dandy small cleaning brush. Nice touch adding that in. Couldn't be happier with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: theresa lafata

customer_reviews.title: Adds more options to vegan diet.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to make vegan noodle dishes. Easy to use. I highly recommend this tool and Ziploc Steamer Bags. This tool helps add more options to a vegan diet. I made noodles out of 2 zucchini fit it all in a Ziploc Steamer Bag (Zip n Steam) cooked for 2 minutes. With half the noodles, I made my husband a Asian noodle dish for lunch and refrigerated leftover noodles (without sauce) to make an Italian noodle dish for his dinner which took about 5 minutes. Both went over really well.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Crowe

customer_reviews.title: i am the worst potato peeler in the world
customer_reviews.text: Ok so started getting into cooking, i just had a baby in December and wanted to learn for my daughter.. i am the worst potato peeler in the world!! I wanted top make curly fries with my little machine i bought off Amazon but couldn't even peel the potatoes.. I searched and bought the uberchef and omg what an amazing product. I was peeling potatoes so fast. Trust me buy this product, you will not be disappointed. They care about their customers, and kept checking in on too see if i had a problem with the product. That is just great customer service!! It's very sturdy and it's beautifully crafted. Five Stars from the new "chef".
customer_reviews.author: Dianneoo7

customer_reviews.title: Fun veggie peeler
customer_reviews.text: This item is easy to hold and use and with the dual sides it is very versatile. The cleaning is taking a bit to get used to, but I will master that technique as well and the brush that came with the peeler is a huge asset to cleaning. Great item and great company to do business with. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene Haney

customer_reviews.title: A nusance to use but it does the job
customer_reviews.text: A nusance to use but it does the job. We like shreded carrots in our salads, but for some reason our local super market has stopped carrying them. I bought this tool so that we could do our own. It does work, but if the shreded carrots appear back I'll be using them instead.
customer_reviews.author: Robert K. Harvey

customer_reviews.title: If you want a peeler, stop looking and just buy this one!
customer_reviews.text: I saw a recipe for julienne-cut cucumbers and I wanted to try it but I lacked the correct tool. I saw that this one was very well rated and decided to risk ordering it. I was very pleasantly surprised to discover that this family owned and operated company sent me 2 emails to insure I was happy with the purchase. The product title informs that this peeler is ultra sharp. I concur! I have used it twice and when it is cleaned and dry I store it in the box to avoid an accidental cut. If the box did not inform the origin country was China, I would have guessed it was American made. It has the feel of quality.
customer_reviews.author: K. Keppel

customer_reviews.title: Lasts forever
customer_reviews.text: I bought this peeler 4 years ago. Used it at multiple restaurant jobs and it works great! super sharp and it never gets dull because it's serrated. It's for sure a heavy duty peeler. I've seen some people complaining of how sharp it is which is really dumb, isn't that what you want? When it comes to your kids, treat it as if it were a knife because the serrated edges do not discriminate. The other side is also useful for veggies or little skinny fries.
customer_reviews.author: Ramtin Behipour

customer_reviews.title: Product is very sharp which will probably be a benefit ...
customer_reviews.text: Product is very sharp which will probably be a benefit in how it cuts through veggies, but ir really should include a simple snap-on cover so you don't cut yourself when grabbing it out of a kitchen drawer. It doesn't come with any information on how to use it and the referenced site to find it online doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: solid peeler
customer_reviews.text: I like quality products- both in look and functionality. and this is a peeler I like quite a bit. it works very nicely. it looks awesome. cleaning is OK / sometimes a little awkward / but to be expected with a peeler I suppose. highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: mike higgins

customer_reviews.title: Finally found the perfect veggie noodle tool.
customer_reviews.text: Finally. I have been looking for a thin veggie spaghetti maker that works well for a few years. I found it in this tool! It makes thin noodles out of my carrots and zucchinis, which totally scratch my itch for pasta. And the little cleaning brush keeps it nice and clean for me without injury. I love this thing! I have a big spiralizer and another hand tool similar to this one, but the UberChef is by far my fave.
customer_reviews.author: Emily S

customer_reviews.title: Nice and sharp
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed this peeler while it lasted. I was only able to use it twice before the welded piece came off on the julienne side. I looked on the Uberchef website to try and contact them but there was no visible link to get in touch with them. It was a really good peeler, sharp and easy to use while it lasted.
customer_reviews.author: LHeisler

customer_reviews.title: I love it!!! It's sharp and has remained that way!!!
customer_reviews.text: Well of course it's sharp y'all. It's supposed to be!!! Cuts and burns happen in the kitchen and a peeler is a perfect example of nicking yourself. It's kinda like when someone says that they're soup or coffee is to hot well you wouldn't want it cold, so why would you want a dull peeler. I mean if that's what you want then just go to the dollar store!!!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Hanshaw

customer_reviews.title: This peeler works awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this peeler. I have always shied away from some recipes because it is so hard to peel a variety of squashes. Not for this peeler. It works wonderfully. I had to cube a butternut squash and I read the best way to go about it was to peel it and then cut it up. This made is so easy. I would tell anyone to get this. Thank you very much. Being able to easily peel vegetables will certainly make me more likely to eat more fresh vegetables because it is so much easier to prepare them. I love it so much I ordered one for my mom and 2 of my friends!
customer_reviews.author: Harley Chick

customer_reviews.title: Best julienning peeler I have ever used !!!
customer_reviews.text: Best peeler I have ever used. I found this on Amazon (where else?) while looking for a replacement for a broken Kuhn Rikon peeler. It was made with plastic handle which is where it broke. This peeler is solid stainless steel with heavier than normal handle and thick blade gussets. The extra weight keeps the blades from flexing and twisting as you peel. The blades are sharp so peeling or julienning (is that a word?) is very easy.
customer_reviews.author: IronBoy

customer_reviews.title: A cleaning brush comes with this which is nice for cleaning the blade out between uses
customer_reviews.text: Very sharp and peals effortlessly. You can use this on potatoes, carrots, or even cheese. The julienne side works very well, and you'd be surprised how handy it is once you start using it. A cleaning brush comes with this which is nice for cleaning the blade out between uses. I have run mine through the dishwasher without problem as well.
customer_reviews.author: Connor

customer_reviews.title: The sharpest tool in the starwars universe!
customer_reviews.text: Put your "victims" down on a cutting board and peel away from your self. This thing is sharp! and you should keep it away from people who aren't used to using power tools. it such a good peeler the only problem with it is people cut themselves with it when they don't use proper peeler safety. I use it Every time I peel stuff, so many potatoes. Again Put your "victims" down on a cutting board and peel away from your self.
customer_reviews.author: Surfin Waffels

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for stir fry or salads
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect for preparing vegetables for stir fry or salads. Produce zucchini noodles for a spaghetti like meal that tastes just as good. Paleo’s best friend.
customer_reviews.author: T. Drymon

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: Works - super sharp, but haven’t cut myself. Wish it came with a little sack or something to store, but I just throw it in a sandwhich bag.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Super Sharp, Quick Julienne Tool
customer_reviews.text: This thing is pretty amazing. I used to julienne all my vegetables by hand, which took forever. This tool is super sharp and makes quick work of that. I can now julienne a whole carrot in under a minute, instead of 3-5 and the results are much more consistent.. It's also super sharp. Love this tool.
customer_reviews.author: Michael E. Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Top of the Line Peeler
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in a fit of blind rage from trying to use my previous peeler and didn't really read the description or any reviews. I gotta say, this is the best peeler I have ever used and arguably my favorite kitchen tool. I bought it as a peeler, but I use the Julienne side much more frequently. It really produces excellent results and I will be buying more of these as gifts in the coming year. When I bought this it did not come with the cleaning brush, which is kind of a bummer, but I am glad they offer that now because it could be very useful to clean between the little teeth without slashing open a finger.
customer_reviews.author: Julie R.

customer_reviews.title: Best peeler in the world!
customer_reviews.text: Well, I am the husband / cook, and I did a dumb thing and accidentally threw out my old old old peeler. I purchased one cheapie after the other as a replacement. I think I have 4 or 5 now in the drawer, and none work very well. I pulled out the UberChef tonight and did some cukes and carrots -- wow. This thing works great. It is easy to use and sharp. Love it. Another thing you can do is to basically shred and curl Parmesan cheese. Works great on that. I told my wife I am buying another to replace the 4 or 5 other lousy peelers in our motorhome. Buy one of these!
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Peel, Julienne, Sharp!
customer_reviews.text: Look for $10 it's a great 2 in 1 tool, very sharp serrated blades. Designed to pull across the vegetable/fruit. I julienned Diakon, Carrots, Papaya, & Mango. Works pretty well, it will occasionally clog, (Ripe Mangos fought me a bit) but each pass produced match stix strands. Easy work for julienne recipes. If you are skilled using a knife you can Julienne just as well with a knife but hey we all need kitchen gadgets and this one works well for the price
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Eckhardt

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with this peeler
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this peeler. I was a little thrown at first because I'd never used a "y" peeler. It is incredibly sharp and made super quick work of sweet potatoes and beets. It works better than my old oxo peeler that it replaced. I like having the multi-tool because it takes less drawer space.The julienne is a bit annoying (hence the cleaning brush), but I've not used a julienne cutter that wasn't and at least this one actually juliennes.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: No instructions
customer_reviews.text: I went to website listed in package for directions. The only thing that was there was a cookbook full of garlic recipes, to use with their garlic press. I had to give my email address so I will probably be getting a bunch of email pushing other products. I also went to their VIP website to register for new information and coupons. A page came up saying there was nothing at that site. I have not used it yet as I just received it 2 days ago. Appears to be well built.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome peeler!!! At first glance it appears like any other peeler only with an added gadget. However! It is durable! It's easy to use! The gadget is one of the best julienne tools I have used!
customer_reviews.author: Trudy

customer_reviews.title: Great for specific purposes like julienne
customer_reviews.text: Spiked side is great for julienned veg. The ‘regular’ peeler side is well-suited to thick-skinned fruits like mangoes, but it peels off rather too much to be used on cucumbers, carrots, and so on, so I use a different peeler for those. (If one wants big ribbons of vegetables, I suppose it’s ideal.)
customer_reviews.author: Samantha S.

customer_reviews.title: Great for cutting soap, sharp even blade!
customer_reviews.text: It's true what others say about this item being sharp. Be sure to wear a gardening glove or some similar thing when working with it. I think it's supposed to be for food, but I'm using it to shave my soap and make it even when it cuts crooked. It gives me a nice smooth bar, and is the easiest thing I've found by far to shape my soaps. Definitely worth checking it out!
customer_reviews.author: Awkward Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Start to finish - The way online buying should be. Thank you
customer_reviews.text: This company has done its homework! Perhaps they know Marcus Lamonis because they have their products, customer service and fast shipping dialed in to perfection. Very nice experience doing business with you. Amazing product (Very Sharp) so pay attention. That's why I ordered this particular product. Tired of rubbing my veggies like I'm starting a fire from friction. Will highly recommend to all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Zoodle master
customer_reviews.text: So cool forst time i saw 1 of these was at a home show, was $30. This is a fraction that price and it does the same thing as the $30 one. Highly recommend, also great for keto people
customer_reviews.author: frederick

customer_reviews.title: My old peeler really sucked and was not doing the job correctly
customer_reviews.text: My old peeler really sucked and was not doing the job correctly. Thankfully Amazon reviews on this product did not do me wrong. The UberChef Premium is exactly what I needed. This peeler/julienne tool is wonderful! The weight on the product feels good in the hand, the blades are very sharp making peeling and julienne a breeze, and it is easy to clean. I reach for this tool frequently.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Really Wonderful Product
customer_reviews.text: This peeler not only works superbly, it's actually pretty enough to have on display in my kitchen. I didn't go that far, but I do marvel that I can admire such a thing as a peeler for its beauty and design. I just wanted a potato peeler when I bought it, and the julienne function is a great bonus; I expect to use it a lot. A little card in the package directed me to a web site with a demonstration video, which was totally unexpected and fun. One of the best product values I've experienced in over 50 years as a consumer.
customer_reviews.author: Earl Beemer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I am blown away by the quality of of this product for the price. I was originally looking for a different julienne slicer but came across this one and took a chance because of all the positive reviews. I am very pleased with the quality and am planning to buy as stocking stuffers when Christmas rolls around for others. I honestly almost never write reviews but when I used this slicer and was so happy that I immediately went on Amazon to see what else this company makes. Also the customer service was very good.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander A Thomson

customer_reviews.title: I also decided I don't like this style of a peeler
customer_reviews.text: I got a few years out of it, but it started to rust recently. I do put it in the dishwasher, but wasn't expecting it to rust. I also decided I don't like this style of a peeler. I find it hard to use and am going back to a more traditional peeler that you brush away from your body. Those work much better for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: B. Mathers

customer_reviews.title: We could not believe how easy it is to use it is to use
customer_reviews.text: My daughter - in - law and I "played" with the slicer as soon as it arrived. We could not believe how easy it is to use it is to use. I normally only fix instant potatoes due to the waste and time consuming peeling. The day i received the slucer we actually fought over who would peel the potatoes. it does make the tedious chore of peeling fun. This morning my sister in law came by and i showed her the slicer and gave her a cucumber to peel. she was sold and wanted too know where to get one.
customer_reviews.author: Deb OKC

customer_reviews.title: waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this peeler looking at the reviews but this peels well but lacks quality. its not worth the price. the peeler's handle just broke. please dont buy this. This is not professional quality as promised
customer_reviews.author: Mahalakshmi

customer_reviews.title: Got it for my restaurant
customer_reviews.text: Sharp as all get out, the julienne blade is good for coleslaw( wish it cut a little thicker). Cruises thru yams and potatoes with a vengeance. My staff loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: The peeler side works really well. The shredder part ...
customer_reviews.text: The peeler side works really well. The shredder part is a bit awkward to use to get the last bit of vegetable with due to the size, so ended up wasting some vegetables or having to finish off with my old shredder and a knife. Also, the shredder side is very hard to clean even using the brush that came with the shredder. I used the thing on papaya and couldn't get the last bit of papaya stuck between the blades of the shredder side off.
customer_reviews.author: El Diablo Robotico

customer_reviews.title: Chef Grade Product
customer_reviews.text: Will buy again as a gift!. Very sharp and smooth only used a few times but it produces a nice precise razor thin slices. Made stove potatoes and onions (guilty starch pleasure) and my childern loved how crunchy all the way thru erything was and not just on the top. The potatoes were crispy and golden brown and evenly cooked because of the uniform slices this peeler produces. I will be using this more frequently as were are looking forward to eating out less and cooking at home very veggie meals!
customer_reviews.author: Shoshanna

customer_reviews.title: Really an improvement in a product.
customer_reviews.text: This unit really does a great job at peeling vegetables. I have bought a few peelers including a top of the line expensive one and all have been fair at best. Peeling is a tedious job but this unit has finally made it substantially more effective and the job is cut in half if not fasted. The peeler cuts so good and doesn't get clogged. The handle also puts a different angle at peeling that is easier on the hand too.
customer_reviews.author: Ydo

customer_reviews.title: great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great for cleaning jobs. Fluid absorbance is good. Enjoy the prompt shipping form this seller.
customer_reviews.author: hqnguyen52

customer_reviews.title: A little pizzazz to your peeling
customer_reviews.text: I like this peeler quite a lot. Haven't had a chance to try the julienne side, but the peeler works quite well. The only reason it's getting four stars is because I didn't realize that the peeler had teeth, which gives the peel I kind of stylized look. Would be great for someone preparing for a party that wanted to make raw vegetables look a little snazzy. Would prefer the smooth edges, but it does nothing to affect the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Bear

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: WOW!!!! Oh this is a sharp tool!!!! And of all glided threw my vegetables with easy.. I wish it had a guard but its okay I mad a place to hang this magnificent tool!!! I read through many reviews and chose this one. I am happy I did!!! The blades never got clogged and clean up was a breeze with a soapy brush and hot water. Seems well made and yet it is from china.. What isn't from china anymore. But all and all a wonderful tool to have!!!
customer_reviews.author: MzClementine

customer_reviews.title: Danger
customer_reviews.text: I was really hoping to love this because we had broken our old vegetable peeler and this is just so much fancier. But after three months of using it I have cut myself with it 2 times and my husband has cut himself a few times as well. We are again in the market for a vegetable peeler.
customer_reviews.author: Mariel

customer_reviews.title: Great experience
customer_reviews.text: The peeler works great after you learn a slight bit of technique. Seems sturdy and reliable. The real magic is the company behind it's distribution. I had a minor issue at first but had a new one in hands the next day. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Allen H

customer_reviews.title: fantastic product
customer_reviews.text: better than any other vegetable peeler. the extra cutting function is great too. easy to use, easy to clean, i mostly use it for carrots, potatoes and apples and it really works fast and efficiently. highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Avo

customer_reviews.title: but still is easy enough to clean
customer_reviews.text: Didn't come with that little cleaner brush, but still is easy enough to clean. This supplants, for me, the need for some spiral machine that costs 5-10 times as much and takes up too much room. Well built, I like this little machine.
customer_reviews.author: J. F. Bridges

customer_reviews.title: A "Peeler" Unlike Others...!
customer_reviews.text: Peeler's may all seem the same but this one is...well, AMAZING! Great price and actual communication by the company (UberChef) prior to it's arrival on how to use, resources and if questions where to call. In other words REAL CUSTOMER SERVICE. On top of it all it peel's like no other and even comes with handy little cleaning brush. A "must have" for any complete kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: Xavier E. Romano

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Upon purchasing I didn't realize this peeler does not leave a smooth peel, it's a little jagged which may not really matter much but I guess I noticed since this is the first time I've owned a peeler that peeled with such a blade. I also was able to try out the julienne blade and was quite disappointed in how I couldn't comfortably julienne most of my carrot without wasting and risking cutting myself. Also the julienned veggies seem a tad too thin IMO. The concept is great but needs work.
customer_reviews.author: Aliceeeee

customer_reviews.title: Good price, good product
customer_reviews.text: Super sharp- does the job! So sharp I recommend it be stored out of children's reach (even though it comes with a slip-cover for the head).
customer_reviews.author: Bikermama81

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t grate or noodle vegetables well.
customer_reviews.text: This product sucks. It doesn’t grate well not does it noodle vegetables well. I emailed the manufacturer twice and they never responded so don’t believe the 100% satisfaction guarantee
customer_reviews.author: Mervin Pan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect after 4 years of use
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this peeler since July 2014. I stopped using my other two peelers the day this one was delivered, and even ordered an UberChef for my daughter. After four years of use, it's still sharp, still durable, still easy to clean. Although it's just a small item, having a really good tool in the kitchen makes life a little easier.
customer_reviews.author: GMW

customer_reviews.title: Sharp
customer_reviews.text: Loved and hated that this thing was extremely sharp. Feels great in my huge hands ordered one for a coworker she wanted it so much
customer_reviews.author: Sammy Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done!
customer_reviews.text: The peeler was very sharp and easy to use. You just have to watch your fingers when the end gets near! I loved how easy it is to julienne vegetables and the fact that it had more than one type of cut. The fact that they included a brush to clean the peeler was a plus!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Dao

customer_reviews.title: Sharp and High Quality
customer_reviews.text: This tool is EVERYTHING the seller claimed it would be ..sharp, well made came with a small brush to clean out the blade..did i mention how sharp it is? I usually peel cucumber with a knife but tonight i used the Uber Chef and not only was the job done in no time but i think i save about half of the cucumber to eat rather than peeling it away with my knife. Cool tool..thanks for making it a quality tool to boot.
customer_reviews.author: pmike

customer_reviews.title: When I'm making a meal/salad for my self, it's excellent!
customer_reviews.text: It could be a little narrower; otherwise, it does a pretty good job. Also, not for bigger projects, like casseroles or meals for more than two (2) people--when I use my electric food processor to address shredding needs.
customer_reviews.author: NMDanLe

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Works as advertised. Easy to use. Very sharp. Don’t know how durable it is yet but it seems very well built and restaurant quality. Easy to clean for me and it’s dishwasher safe. I will update if I run into any issues.
customer_reviews.author: J.J. Blickstein

customer_reviews.title: My only gripe is that it can be somewhat tedious to clean the bits that get caught on the ...
customer_reviews.text: This peeler works extremely well, having used it primarily on squash and potatoes for both peeling and julienne options. My only gripe is that it can be somewhat tedious to clean the bits that get caught on the julienne side. I found I had to poke out bits between the teeth individually with a fork. Being all-metal, I was hoping it would be able to be disassembled. That being said, this will continue to get regular use in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: TTFK

customer_reviews.title: Good but could be better
customer_reviews.text: It is a very good peeler. The julienne blade works quite well and because the vegetables are sliced so thinly and uniformly, they are really more delicious my usual hand chopped veggies. There should be peelers with replaceable blades. While this is a quite nice peeler, everyone knows the problem with peelers is the blades get dull. I will keep mine clean and dry and hope for long life, but still it will go dull, we all know it. UberChef: Peeler with replaceable blades. Get on that!
customer_reviews.author: SomeRandomConsumer

customer_reviews.title: This tools works as good if not better than the professional grade one
customer_reviews.text: We took a trip to Paris this year and purchased a cooking class in which the chef used a tool similar to this (much greater price) to Julienne some vegetables. We were impressed and had to have one. We weren't willing to pay the price though, so we AMAZONed it. This tools works as good if not better than the professional grade one. As an aside, the first one we got in the mail had a defect. I contacted Uberchef and they immediately sent me a replacement, no questions asked. Great service!
customer_reviews.author: George Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Clean, Any Injuries are Operator Error
customer_reviews.text: Great, handy little tool. Saw some reviews complaining about 1) the cleaning and 2) a photo documented injury. 1) Cleaning: If you don’t like the included brush use a toothpick. I shredded mozzarella with the julien shredder and most of it washed off in the kitchen sink. 2) Injury: Blaming an injury on this tool is like blaming a chefs knife for cutting your finger.
customer_reviews.author: nate

customer_reviews.title: Great product, strong and small with a multitude of uses!
customer_reviews.text: This is hands down one of my favorite kitchen tools. Strong stainless, which still looks as new as the day I purchased. Easily peels veggies. Shreds carrots, etc for cole slaw. Shreds potatoes into little strips for home fries or crispy toppings. It juliennes! So many functions in one small tool. I wash it with a nylon bristle brush and it cleans up well every time, with no gross food residue discovered later in crevices. I'm a fan of the built in hook, which helps in our small kitchen where we often store utensils hanging.
customer_reviews.author: L.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, solid
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, solid, amazing peeler. The quality for the price is unmatched, and the customer service from UberChef is unparallelled, which is what a lot of companies fail to realize and unfortunately poor customer service has become the norm rather than the exception. Any company, including UberChef, that offers premiere customer service along with premiere products will get my business every time, I highly recommend this product to anyone looking for something similar.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Gant

customer_reviews.title: SUPER PRODUCT!!!
customer_reviews.text: My peeler arrived very quickly and in excellent condition. The customer service department is absolutely fantastic as they follow your transaction all the way and contact you to make sure you are satisfied. There is also a short video available on line to see exactly how to use the peeler which I thought was nice. I used it when making vegetable soup the other night and carrots, potatoes, zuchinni peeled with ease....Very excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Saavy Sue

customer_reviews.title: Makes Great Zucchini Noodles
customer_reviews.text: Great julienne tool, easy to use, I got two more for my kids. Great with zucchini and squash so far, more to try.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne F

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic peeler
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, sturdy and easy to use - exactly as advertised! Customer service contacted me before I even received the peeler to let me know that it was on the way, and what to do in the event of any problems which was really helpful. I just julienned a bag of carrots fresh from the farm for a fabulous fall salad, and found the peeler to work easily and efficiently. It was also excellent for peeling. Can't wait to try butternut squash "noodles", next!
customer_reviews.author: hedgewytch

customer_reviews.title: Where has this gadget been all my life?
customer_reviews.text: This is my first julienne peeler - I've always Macgyvered it with a standard potato peeler. I have no idea why I waited so long, this thing is a dream and very easy to wash. I've julienned zucchini, carrots, I even did an apple for a recipe. It's a very useful little tool that I would recommend for any cook. NOTE: I've since tried the peeler, that takes a little skill but once you figure it out, it's amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Ange

customer_reviews.title: Superb quality.
customer_reviews.text: Shocked. I am so shocked and surprised to see that I have not left a review of this before now. This thing is the real deal. Superb quality. Sold. Super sharp. It makes food prep so effortless. My only caveat: Be very careful when using this! This is not your average "peeler". It can very quickly whittle down a nail, or a piece of skin!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Drawdy

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful peeler
customer_reviews.text: This is a great peeler, it is very sharp and easy to use. Have used it for carrots and potatoes and both were great. The Jullienne is ok, it is a bit small, but we have used it and it works when we want a small garnish or maybe shredded carrots in a salad. Really happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: Barclay Bicksler

customer_reviews.title: This amazing tool gives me the delicious taste of pasta with ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this nifty little tool because I'm unable to eat pasta due to gluten sensitivities and other pasta's made with other grains aren't very tasty. This amazing tool gives me the delicious taste of pasta with veggies of many kinds. So yummy and so quick and easy! I've used it for a couple weeks only but it seems to be a very sturdy tool and very easy to clean. Hopefully it will stay nice and sharp over time. I'm very happy with this new kitchen tool. Great new recipes on the table.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Douglass

customer_reviews.title: This is definitely worth every penny!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was amazing! I peeled a bag of carrots in under 6 minutes with no strain and definitely no frustrations! The peels didn't get jammed in the gadget! And the peeler only peeled as opposed to taking chunks off the carrot. Wow! If I knew peeling carrots could be so easy...almost fun, I would have bought this years ago!! Haha!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Lee

customer_reviews.title: Sharp and strong
customer_reviews.text: I had bought one for myself a while back. My wife is really happy with how sharp the knife is. I bought this one for my mother after she came to visit, and found our peeler to be very nice. We peel buttennut squash with this very easily. I just bought a third one for my mother in law. Even though the peeler is much more expensive than what is available in Wal-mart, I've purchase the expensive UberChef, because of the product quality.
customer_reviews.author: Khaled

customer_reviews.title: a must have!
customer_reviews.text: These peelers are a must have for a busy cook. They are sharp and can peel a potato in no time at all. the julienne feature is great for making a beautiful salad and will take your culinary creating to the next level. I keep two of these in my drawers at all times. Arrived promptly and in new condition.
customer_reviews.author: the bakerlady

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite tool
customer_reviews.text: The julian cutter isn't all that great to use as it is very thin on the cut. Maybe that is the way it should be. I felt when using the peeler side it was taking too much of the carrot or potato with the peel. I do use this peeler but when I reach for a peeler in the drawer, I don't search it out and will use whatever is closest.
customer_reviews.author: Royall Clark

customer_reviews.title: This is very sharp
customer_reviews.text: Our ceramic one broke and we got this. It is so easy to use and because it is so sharp it does a great job.
customer_reviews.author: John  McD

customer_reviews.title: Sharp as all get out, makes fast easy work.
customer_reviews.text: REALLY sharp. makes easy work of anything you want to peel or julienne into strips (flip it to use the other side). the ends are also sharp and remove potato eyes, etc. Use a bristle brush to clean (I forget if mine came with a brush, or use a baby bottle brush or a toothbrush). My mom was jealous of it when I brought it home to peel potatoes at Thanksgiving (my yearly job). Cheers! Cons: tricky to clean, it's sharp!
customer_reviews.author: Geneva

customer_reviews.title: indispensable gadget!
customer_reviews.text: If I lost mine today, I'd order another one tonight.
customer_reviews.author: Bill F Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good product but peeler part came off
customer_reviews.text: Used very rarely to peel carrots and worked great. But the head of the peeler came off and with the metal construction, it is not possible to put back on.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie X. Miao

customer_reviews.title: Sharp as a tack
customer_reviews.text: This thing is EXCELLENT. I bought it because my original old school peeler gave up the ghost. And I needed something that could withstand the pressure of larger items such as carrots and Potatoes. Not only does this UberChef deliver, but also EXCEEDS my expectations. Be careful using it though, it's sharp as a tack! Will not let you down. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: robsterw

customer_reviews.title: Peeling machine!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a beast. Rips through butternut squash & anything else I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very sharp
customer_reviews.text: This is the sharpest peeler that I have ever had. Kind of scary but very nice to use. Sometimes it can be more difficult since the blade sits on the front and not on the side, but doesn't bother me too much.
customer_reviews.author: Kitts

customer_reviews.title: Gets plugged
customer_reviews.text: Good but has a few issues Very sharp be careful Could be designed better gets plugged easily
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Thayer

customer_reviews.title: Makes Keto friendly zucchini noodles!
customer_reviews.text: I love making zucchini noodles using this tool. I am able to avoid the seeds making the zucchini stay firmer. It is great with an creamy tomato sauce for my Keto diet. Next up is eggplant. Fingers crossed!
customer_reviews.author: Linbird

product_meta.title: UberChef UC-JP101 Erg Premium Ultra Sharp Julienne Peeler & Vegetable Stainless Steel Ergonomic, Potato Apple Peeler-Cleaning Brush In, Silver
product_meta.description: "this peeler is awesome!! It is made of strong, durable metal and looks like it will last a lifetime" -Cheri "Why are you still reading this? You should buy it and see for yourself how great it is!" -Elaine "This is the best vegetable peeler I have ever used." -Linda Professional Chef-Approved Julienne Peeler - A Must-Have For Every Kitchen Transform your dishes & save time with this super sharp stainless steel Julienne & Vegetable Peeler Our Peelers have been designed with professional chefs in mind. We have the sharpest blade available that will shred anything. Check out what our customers have said: "The Julienne makes even, perfect cuts...no friction or drag. I was surprised by how quickly (and professionally) I was able to make garnish" -Mike (Top 50 Reviewer) "Peels veggies smoothly and effortlessly!" -Kelly Let's face it: few have the time to prepare regularly prepare meals that require intricate cutting and slicing. And slicing one fine piece of carrot, zucchini, or other vegetable after another is terribly boring and tedious. That changes now with your new UberChef Julienne Peeler. Glide the Julienne blade down your vegetable and do in seconds what used to take several minutes. Those healthy vegetarian, vegan, paleo or side dishes or cheese are now easy and quick to make! Speaking of paleo, have you tried Zoodles? When you get your peeler, do this: use the Julienne side to slice veggies into long, thin strands. Toss with a olive oil and garlic and you just made a healthy, low-carb, paleo-friendly (and waist-friendly) meal that tastes as great as it looks. UberChef products are backed by a 100% lifetime guarantee. There is no risk to you. Try it. If you don't love it, return it for a refund. Scroll to the top of this page and click "Add to Cart"
feature_bullets: ★ 4.9 OUT OF 5 STAR RATING: Professional chefs, backyard grill kings, amateur cooks, and all of our customers agree that the #1 Top Rated UberChef Julienne Peeler is the BEST tool for creating unique, healthy, and beautiful meals.
★ STAINLESS STEEL & DISHWASHER SAFE: UberChef Ergonomic Vegetable Peeler uses a high quality stainless steel that presents as a beautiful brushed metal and completely dishwasher safe.

★ VERSATILE & MULTIFUNCTIONAL: Peeling vegetables, potatoes, carrots, sweet potatoes, and other veggies just got a WHOLE lot easier with our SUPER sharp vegetable peeling blade. This is a MUST-HAVE Chef-Inspired kitchen tool! Plus, with the sharpest blades on the market, and a pro chef inspired design, you'll be making beautiful meals in a fraction of the time.

★ ENDLESS RECIPES & DISH OPPORTUNITIES: From zoodles (zucchini noodles!) to garnishing salads and appetizer to sweet potato fries and sliced cheese, our Julienne Peeler & Vegetable Peeler has you covered. Next time your guests ask you how you made such an amazing dish, don't let them know you sliced your work in half with your UberChef Vegetable Peeler.

★ 100% UBERCHEF MANUFACTURER WARRANTY: If, for any reason, you don't absolutely love your new expert crafted UberChef Dual Julienne & Vegetable Peeler, just return it. We'll refund every penny (or replace it, if there is a problem). That's the UberChef Guarantee.
